pages.text: $(li)The Rabbit Hide is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/slingshot)Slingshots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/leatherworker)Leatherworkers$(/l) will change this material by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emerald$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/rabbit)Rabbits$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
